name: Infernoble Knight Ricciardetto
desc: You can banish this card from your hand or GY; Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower FIRE Warrior monster from your hand as a Tuner. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 Level 4 or lower FIRE Warrior monster in your GY, except "Infernoble Knight Ricciardetto"; Special Summon it, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except Warrior monsters. You can only use 1 "Infernoble Knight Ricciardetto" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
